phrases: Cannot you pull a better face than that?
Do you have a fever again?
The First Date is the Beginning of Misfortune
I thought my heart was going to burst.
I could not sleep at all last night.
At this rate, I will die of heart failure, thanks to Otani.
Risa, do you have summer classes again today?
You have really got to get it together, do not you?
Your future will be something to look forward to.
I am just... no good without you, Koizumi.
So this and that really were not dreams.
What are you, some old geezer?
Well, I was wearing a hat, so...
Wha-What are you doing wearing that, you idiot?!
Then just when am I supposed to wear it?
What is that supposed to mean?
You absolutely cannot tell those guys anything unnecessary, okay.
So like I said, just keep your mouth shut.
Why should I have to listen to your lecturing?
I just want to say so out loud.
I am sorry, but I do not just want to tell Nobu-chan.
I want the whole world to know how happy I am...
Risa, you got that necklace from Otani-kun, right?
When did he give it to you?
Yesterday, while you guys were watching the fireworks.
Were you guys sneaking around doing things behind our backs?
Well, he gave me a present,
What the heck is that kyaah about?!
Well, I have been trying really hard, but now it is paying off...
You worked really hard for this.
All Hanshin-Kyojin are finally a couple.
It is been a long wait.
We are not going out yet.
Did not he ask you out?
So... he just gave you a present?
Well, I got more than just a present...
But let us just leave it at that.
What is that supposed to mean?
But Risa-chan, you said your dream came true.
You see, not long ago he said...
I mean, suppose she was my girlfriend.
Then we would have to kiss.
Even though the two of us are alone in this room right now, I do not feel a thing.
All of my hard work has paid off.
Well then, I will see you tomorrow.
Want to go somewhere before going home?
At this point it would be natural to jump straight into dating, would not it?
I forgot to give this to you.
A ticket to the World Athletics Championships!
And it is the night of the finals!
These tickets are really hard to get.
My dad's been itching to get one.
I do not get you at all.
Oh, this is a friend of mine from middle school.
Do not tell me this is your boyfriend?
We are just friends, just friends.
But he might be my boyfriend tomorrow...
You always said you would never go for a guy shorter than you, right Risa?
Well, I have got to get going.
I said that stuff about not wanting a boyfriend shorter than me a long time ago.
Well, you are always like this.
What do you mean, I am always like this?
You make it sound like I am always late!
You are late one in every three times we go somewhere.
You are going to lecture me when you are the one who was late?
Well, I will treat you to something today.
It should have been like that...
The event is about to start.
Ah... I have some change in my pocket.
What are you, some old geezer?!
Were you on your way to go play Pachinko?
That is why I wanted to get my bag.
It will be my treat today.
It is a good thing I held on to your ticket.
You there, get out of the way!
What are you doing, you old bags?
I think my finger got cut by one of those women's handbags.
I always keep some in my handb
He easily passed the 80 meter mark!
If Otani's ex-girlfriend, Kanzaki, was in that situation,
She was manager of the basketball team, after all.
She really was a sweet girl, that Kanzaki-san.
Koizumi, you have been sighing for a while now.
I am having fun, I am having fun.
I am sorry for being like this...
I will tell you what bothered me last time.
Could not you have paused for a second before saying we were just friends?
Are you talking about what I said when I bumped into Ake-chi back then?
Do you honestly think I would do that with someone I considered just a friend?!
I would never kiss a girl who was just a friend!
After kissing like that, we are not just friends, are we?
But you never told me clearly.
The kiss alone was enough to make me happy!
Why would I have done something like that for no reason?
I am going to have you arrested for stealing my heart, old man.
I like you a lot, Otani!
I am seriously in love with you!
And... you love me too, right, Otani?
What were you thinking, saying all that in front of so many people?!
What is with that ugly face of yours?
You have stolen my heart, Otani.
I have stolen it, have I?
I want to steal yours, too.
Mine is not so easy to steal.
Go get me something to drink.
You have change, do not you?
You want to steal my heart, do not you?
Otani sure is a nice guy.
I am falling in love with him even more.
I wonder if he is really happy with me...
This road has sure been long.
This is my first time experiencing requited love.
From now on, we are going to be all lovey-dovey!
I am not used to these shoes.
Why do not you sit down over there?
It is a good thing I am carrying bandages...
She would always carry bandages, would not she...
Raise your foot a bit, okay?
She is such a sweet girl.
I am so embarrassed right now.
You cannot like a girl this embarrassing, right?
You would prefer Kanzaki-san to me, right?
Kanzaki-san is still broken hearted after breaking up with her giant.
Our time was short, but it made me so happy!
I will take it from here.
Um... sorry, what was your name again?
The giant's waiting for you, right?
Apparently she and the giant got back together so they came here today.
Are you really okay with having a girlfriend like me?
What are you talking about now?
This happened because you got carried away and wore clothes you are not used to.
But this... this is our first date.
I wanted to look cuter for you.
I think my heart was just stolen a little.
After that, I cried for ages.
Because of that, I could not see the World Championships through my tears.
Just how many hearts do you have?
You are finally back to your usual self.
I am in my second year of middle school.
This is the first I have heard about it!
Your old man is waiting for you, right?
A lame girl like that is A-chan's girlfriend?
There is no way I will accept it!
Koizumi, want to come study at my place?
The Dangerous Beauty Who Burns With Jealousy!!
The Dangerous Beauty Who Burns With Jealousy!!
